name: Vamsidhar VURIMINDI, Petitioner v. Judge Diana ANHALT and Court of Common Pleas, Philadelphia, Respondents

parties: Vamsidhar VURIMINDI, Petitioner v. Judge Diana ANHALT and Court of Common Pleas, Philadelphia, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 10th day of December, 2015, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED, and the Protho-notary is DIRECTED to strike the name of the jurist from the caption.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
127 A.3d 1291
Vamsidhar VURIMINDI, Petitioner v. Judge Diana ANHALT and Court of Common Pleas, Philadelphia, Respondents.
No. 133 EM 2015.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 10, 2015.
